revised_title: Investigating the Functions of the Vagus and Cervical Sympathetic Nerves in Humans
tldr: The author conducted experiments on human subjects to study the functions of the vagus and cervical sympathetic nerves. They used mechanical irritation by pressure on the nerve trunk to observe the effects on the heart, stomach, lungs, and other organs. The results provided insights into the sensory and motor functions of these nerves in both healthy and diseased states.
